term.title: aneroid barometer

item.text: An instrument for monitoring the atmospheric pressure in which no liquid is employed, but rather changes in pressure between the atmosphere and a closed vessel bend a diaphram which moves a pointer on a scale.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2175 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
